Package io.github.clivelewis.cvrclient

Class CvrClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.clivelewis.cvrclient.CvrClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class CvrClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Main class. Creates an instance of CvrApiClient and provides high-level methods to access data from CVR API.
    It is recommended to create 1 instance of this class and use it throughout your application.
    Main goal of this class is to create an easy-to-use abstraction layer over API calls and ElasticSearch Query creation.

    If you want to have more control (or expand functionality) you can access ElasticSearch Java Client by calling apiClient().getElasticRestClient();

      • findAllActiveCompaniesByBranchCode

        public <T extends CvrCompanyDataModel> java.util.List<T> findAllActiveCompaniesByBranchCode​(java.lang.String branchCode,
                                                                                            java.lang.Class<T> resultModel)
                                                                                     throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Find all ACTIVE companies in a specified branch (industry). This method uses Search Scroll Query to retrieve large amount of entries.
        Type Parameters:
        T - CvrCompanyDataModel implementation.
        Parameters:
        branchCode - Branch (Industry) code.
        resultModel - Model class for deserialized JSON company data.
        Returns:
        List of CVR company data models. Empty list if no data was found.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If Jackson couldn't deserialize JSON to our model.

      • searchInCompanyIndex

        public <T extends CvrCompanyDataModel> java.util.List<T> searchInCompanyIndex​(org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest request,
                                                                              java.lang.Class<T> resultModel)
                                                                       throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        General method to make search requests in the CVR company index. Build your own SearchRequest object, provide CvrCompanyData model implementation and you are good to go.
        Type Parameters:
        T - CvrCompanyDataModel implementation.
        Parameters:
        request - any SearchRequest. Check ElasticSearch documentation to understand how to build queries.
        resultModel - Model class for deserialized JSON company data.
        Returns:
        List of CVR company data models. Empty list if no data was found.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - If Jackson couldn't deserialize JSON to our model.

      • searchInCompanyIndex

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchInCompanyIndex​(org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest request)
        General method to make search requests in the CVR company index.
        Parameters:
        request - any SearchRequest. Check ElasticSearch documentation to understand how to build queries.
        Returns:
        List where each element is a JSON representation of company data. Empty List if nothing was found or something went wrong.
